page.title: 13Games Children Play
page.content: In the playground I play marbles, football and baseball. Marbles are little glass balls with coloured patterns inside them. They come in all different sizes from very tiny ones called "Tiny Tims" to very large ones called "King Sizes". There are also other names for special ones like Moonies and Oilies. In marbles you can play hits or pots. I play pots. In this you try winning all the marbles in the pot.The one{ to get the very last marble in wins. At home I play on my computer.I have lots of different games.The Hobbit is an adventure game which has got written text.You are Bilbo Baggins.You meet people like Gandalf the magician and Thorin the son of the King. The idea of the game is to get to Smorg a dragon and steal all his treasure. I sometimes go for bicycle rides.
